channel.title: *fixed* please help ?! *fixed*
channel.description:
when mods talk in clan chat, the icon changes to "donor icon" but in public chat its "mod icon" here... [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/4gruqu.png[/img]
How To Change That ??? PLEASE HELP !

item.title: *fixed* please help ?! *fixed*
item.dc:creator: @Sol0 Sol0
item.description:
@Sol0 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:38, topic:512742”]Try this:

//My players icons showing up when I speak if(myPrivilege == 1) { pushMessage(myPlayer.textSpoken, 2, "@cr0@" + "<col=13132800>"+getRank(myPlayer.skill)+"</col>" + myPlayer.name); } else if(myPrivilege == 2) { pushMessage(myPlayer.textSpoken, 2, "@cr1@" + "<col=13132800>"+getRank(myPlayer.skill)+"</col>" + myPlayer.name); } else if(myPrivilege == 3) { pushMessage(myPlayer.textSpoken, 2, "@cr2@" + "<col=13132800>"+getRank(myPlayer.skill)+"</col>" + myPlayer.name); } else if(myPrivilege == 4) { pushMessage(myPlayer.textSpoken, 2, "@cr3@" + "<col=13132800>"+getRank(myPlayer.skill)+"</col>" + myPlayer.name); } else { pushMessage(myPlayer.textSpoken, 2, "<col=13132800>"+getRank(myPlayer.skill)+"</col>" + myPlayer.name); } [/quote]
omggg!!! thanks bro it worked ! without u it wouldn’t be fixed ! you’re the best !!!
dude pm ur skype … i’m so giving u some credits for this help <3 Thnx again !

Read full topic

item.title: *fixed* please help ?! *fixed*
item.dc:creator: @Sol0 Sol0
item.description:
@Sol0 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:36, topic:512742”]Yep.
Replace with:

//My players icons showing up when I speak if(myPrivilege == 4) { pushMessage(myPlayer.textSpoken, 2, "@cr0@" + "<col=13132800>"+getRank(myPlayer.skill)+"</col>" + myPlayer.name); } else if(myPrivilege == 3) { pushMessage(myPlayer.textSpoken, 2, "@cr1@" + "<col=13132800>"+getRank(myPlayer.skill)+"</col>" + myPlayer.name); } else if(myPrivilege == 2) { pushMessage(myPlayer.textSpoken, 2, "@cr2@" + "<col=13132800>"+getRank(myPlayer.skill)+"</col>" + myPlayer.name); } else if(myPrivilege == 1) { pushMessage(myPlayer.textSpoken, 2, "@cr3@" + "<col=13132800>"+getRank(myPlayer.skill)+"</col>" + myPlayer.name); } else { pushMessage(myPlayer.textSpoken, 2, "<col=13132800>"+getRank(myPlayer.skill)+"</col>" + myPlayer.name); }[/quote]

Admin= Owner Icon
Mod= Donor Icon
Donor= Mod Icon

item.title: *fixed* please help ?! *fixed*
item.dc:creator: @Sol0 Sol0
item.description:
@Sol0 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:34, topic:512742”]Nope.
Should look a bit like this:
pushMessage(s, 1, “@cr1@” + player.name);[/quote]
//My players icons showing up when I speak
if(myPrivilege == 4) {
pushMessage(myPlayer.textSpoken, 2, “@cr0@” + “<col=13132800>”+getRank(myPlayer.skill)+"" + myPlayer.name);
} else if(myPrivilege == 3) {
pushMessage(myPlayer.textSpoken, 2, “@cr2@” + “<col=13132800>”+getRank(myPlayer.skill)+"" + myPlayer.name);
} else if(myPrivilege == 2) {
pushMessage(myPlayer.textSpoken, 2, “@cr2@” + “<col=13132800>”+getRank(myPlayer.skill)+"" + myPlayer.name);
} else if(myPrivilege == 1) {
pushMessage(myPlayer.textSpoken, 2, “@cr1@” + “<col=13132800>”+getRank(myPlayer.skill)+"" + myPlayer.name);
} else {
pushMessage(myPlayer.textSpoken, 2, “<col=13132800>”+getRank(myPlayer.skill)+"" + myPlayer.name);
}

^This?

item.title: *fixed* please help ?! *fixed*
item.dc:creator: @Sol0 Sol0
item.description:
@Sol0 wrote:

sk8rdude461:

You need to edit the the modicons[] for the normal chat, not clan chat…

This One Right ?

if((chatType == 1 || chatType == 2) && (chatType == 1 || publicChatMode == 0 || publicChatMode == 1 && isFriendOrSelf(s1))) { if (chatTypeView == 1 || chatTypeView == 0) { if(yPos > 0 && yPos < 110) { int xPos = 19; switch(byte0) { case 1: modIcons[0].drawSprite(xPos, yPos - 12); xPos += 10; break; case 2: modIcons[1].drawSprite(xPos, yPos - 12); xPos += 14; break; case 3: modIcons[2].drawSprite(xPos, yPos - 12); xPos += 14; break; case 4: modIcons[3].drawSprite(xPos, yPos - 12); xPos += 14; break; }

item.title: *fixed* please help ?! *fixed*
item.dc:creator: @Sol0 Sol0
item.description:
@Sol0 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:28, topic:512742”][quote author=Sol0 link=topic=630986.msg4274808#msg4274808 date=1364854561]

Lol, so your problem must be in the pngs.

Easily.
Or it’s a client-to-server issue with his rights.
The last image of his cache he posted has the rights as so:
playerRights 1: Donor image
playerRights 2: Mod image
playerRights 3: Owner image
playerRights 4: Super-Donor (green donor) image
playerRights 5: Same as 4.

you mean like this?
getPA().sendFrame126("@cya@Playername: @blu@"+ Misc.optimizeText(playerName) +" " , 29172);
if (playerRights == 4)
getPA().sendFrame126("@cya@Rank: @blu@Donator", 29173);
else if (playerRights == 3)
getPA().sendFrame126("@cya@Rank: @blu@Owner", 29173);
else if (playerRights == 2)
getPA().sendFrame126("@cya@Rank: @blu@Admin", 29173);
else if (playerRights == 1)
getPA().sendFrame126("@cya@Rank: @blu@Mod", 29173);
else if (playerRights == 0)
[/quote]
I mean.
What the hell are you ranks.[/quote]
But I Know That In My Server

playerRights 1: Mod
playerRights 2: Admin
playerRights 3: Owner
playerRights 4: Donor
playerRights 5: Nothing

switch(chatRights[k]) {
case 1:
j2 += clanNameWidth;
modIcons[0].drawSprite(j2 - 18, yPos - 12);
j2 += 15;
break;
case 2:
j2 += clanNameWidth;
modIcons[1].drawSprite(j2 - 18, yPos - 12);
j2 += 15;
break;
case 3:
j2 += clanNameWidth;
modIcons[2].drawSprite(j2 - 18, yPos - 12);
j2 += 15;
break;
case 4:
j2 += clanNameWidth;
modIcons[3].drawSprite(j2 - 18, yPos - 12);
j2 += 15;
break;
default:
j2 += clanNameWidth;
break;
}[/quote]
